subject: p19720782
History: Severe COPD, admitted with COPD exacerbation.
Findings: Elevation of the right lung base is unchanged. A moderate right pleural effusion is not significantly changed. There is no focal consolidation or pneumothorax, although the lung apices are partially obscured by overlying soft tissues of the neck. Prominence of the right perihilar region is unchanged and compatible with radiation changes. The cardiomediastinal contours are stable. Pulmonary vascular congestion is unchanged.
